title: Unranked to Ranked
body:
I am currently lvl 21 and on the way to ranked. I really want to get to gold V when i finish my 10 matches.
Any tips when playing those 10 games? and should i play soloQ or with a friend?

replies.body: do not do the placement games once you hit 30 with no runes.... and also play normal games till you atleast have a decent winrate then go try them out with atleast 30 champions unlocked and also try play all position till you are familiar with them all so when you cannot get your best role you are able to still atleast play half-decent with one of the other roles

Unless you are a prodigy AND get incredibly lucky to get no AFK's in your placements, then you might make it to gold. Chances are you will be placed in bronze. If you are lucky and very good you might get silver. I recommend playing soloq over playing with a friend because when you play duoq two things happen. 1. The system automatically gives you worse teammates than the enemy to compensate for the fact that your duo'd, because you have the advantage of communication. 2. You will often both gang up on team mates and 'coddle' each other and blame the rest of the team even if it you made this mistake. When this happens your skill level decreases rather than increases. I would only recommend duo'ing when you are above silver 3 so you can some what use it to your advantage and coordinate with each other.
Pray to the league gods, and do it soloq. You'll be matched with higher tier players if you do it duo'd.
